svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Pieces of mail handled vs the number of post offices, United States
Figure illustrates the pieces of mail handled by the US postal service, and the number of post offices over time.
